title: 5 Best Albums of 2018 (So Far)
summary: Kendrick Lamar has proven himself to be one of the best artists in music with each album release. His previous album, “To Pimp a Butterfly,” was praised for its fusion of hip-hop, jazz, and poetry. “Melodrama” the second album from New Zealand singer Lorde is a concept album about the experience of growing up in suburbia. Ed Sheeran’s third studio album has been critically praised  for its mature, varied sound.
